Las_Vegas.Casino Royale Hotel & Casino:
The Best Western Plus Casino Royale (formerly known as the Nob Hill Casino and Casino Royale) is a casino and small hotel on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. The casino caters to low rollers, and features low table minimums for roulette, craps, and blackjack.
The casino until recently offered 100 times odds on craps at all times.
